SELECT * FROM (
SELECT @NO := @NO + 1 AS ROWNO, PRPTYGROUPNAME, PRPTYGROUPDESC FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM02, (SELECT @NO := 0) R
UPPER(PRPTYGROUPNAME) LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #searchPrptyGroupName# , '%')
) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM02
UPPER(PrptyGroupName) LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #searchPrptyGroupName# , '%')
